    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>

          </identifier>
          <identifier>

          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="es">La energía solar y los agentes geológicos externos</string>
            <string language="en">Solar energy and external geological agents</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Solarenergie und externe geologische Mittel</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Énergie solaire et agents géologiques externes</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Energia solar e agentes geological externos</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Energia solare ed agenti geologici esterni</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ηλιακή ενέργεια και εξωτερικοί γεωλογικοί πράκτορες</string>
          </title>
          <language>es</language>
          <description>
            <string language="es">Sinopsis de los temas tratados en la Secuencia Didáctica de la Energía Externa del Planeta. También se establece un puente de conexión con la Secuencia Didáctica de Agentes Geológicos Externos I.</string>
            <string language="en">Synopsis of the topics dealt with in the Learning Sequence on the Planet's External Energy. There is also a connecting link to the Learning Sequence External Geological Agents I.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">agentes geológicos externos</string>
            <string language="en">external geological agents</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">geología</string>
            <string language="en">geology</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">biosfera</string>
            <string language="en">biosphere</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">energía solar</string>
            <string language="en">solar energy</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <value>collection</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Synopse der Themen beschäftigte in der 
erlernenreihenfolge auf der externen Energie des Planeten. Es 
gibt auch ein anschließendes Link zu den erlernenreihenfolge externen
geologischen Vertretern I.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La synthèse des sujets a traité dans l'ordre 
d'étude sur l'énergie externe de la planète. Il y a 
également une biellette aux agents géologiques externes d'étude 
d'ordre I.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O synopsis dos tópicos tratou na seqüência de 
aprendizagem na energia externa do planeta. Há também uma 
ligação conectando aos agentes geological externos de aprendizagem 
da seqüência I.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">La sinossi dei soggetti si è occupata nella 
sequenza imparante sull'energia esterna del pianeta. Ci è 
egualmente un collegamento di collegamento agli agenti geologici 
esterni imparanti di sequenza I.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Σύνοψη των θεμάτων που εξετάζονται στην ακολουθία 
εκμάθησης στην εξωτερική ενέργεια του πλανήτη. Υπάρχει 
επίσης μια συνδέοντας σύνδεση με τους μαθαίνοντας εξωτερικούς 
γεωλογικούς πράκτορες Ι ακολουθίας.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">externe geologische Mittel</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Geologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Biosphäre</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Solarenergie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">agents géologiques externes</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">géologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">biosphère</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">énergie solaire</string>
          </keyword>
